edu.berkeley.path.beats.util
Class UnitConverter

java.lang.Object
  edu.berkeley.path.beats.util.UnitConverter

public class UnitConverter
extends java.lang.Object

Converts scenario units from US (mile, hour) or Metric (kilometer, hour) to SI (meter, second).
